title: gOvinda ennirO
sahitya:
gOvindana ennirO hari gOvinda nAmava mareyadirO


caraNam 1    tumbiruva paTTaNakombhattu bAgilu sambhramadharasugaLaidu 
mandi Dambhakatanadinda kAyuva jIvana nambi necci keDabEDi kANirO
    caraNam 2    neleyu illada kyavelubina panjara olidu suttida carmada hodike 
mala mUtragaLiravu kIvu krimigaLu bariya togala mecci keDa bEDirO
    caraNam 3    hara brahma surarige vanditanAgippa hari sarvOttamanendennirO 
purandara viTTalana caraNava bhajisirO durita bhayagaLellavu parihara
